title: i am too toxic and i am seeking help
body:
i don't know to not be toxic
i want to** hurt you** mentally if you challenge me
if i fuck up and u say "outplayed" in all chat
i want to fucking **break your soul**
if u say "wow (champion i am playing) why didnt you help me" and its a stupid situation
i will never let this get by me the entire game
if you miss smite i will type gg (whatever the jungler is) in all chat

**i need help**, ive been this way since i started playing cs as a kid
